snippet.title: Swift: Firebase 3 - How to Implement Image Zoom (Ep 19)
snippet.description:
Hello everyone, its been quite a long time since I've made a new video.  Hope everyone has enjoyed their break and is ready to get back into coding mode.  For today's lesson, I'll go over how to implement image zooming when tapping one of the cells in our chat controller.  The animation will perhaps look quite advanced when seeing it for the first time.  Fortunately its not that hard to implement as long as you break it down into little mini steps. Enjoy.

Previous Episode 18:
https://youtu.be/FqDVKW9Rn_M

All episodes for Firebase 3 series:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JEfHqwjBV0XFb9qx9cGXwkq

Completed Source Code
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/firebase-chat-messenger

Want to learn more about iOS Development? Here are a few additional playlist resources on my channel:

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JEXct3-OV6itP7Kz3tRDmma

Lets Build Facebook Feed series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JHDWIO3x4wePhD8G4d1Fa6N

Lets Build Facebook Messenger series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JHGoEg41IJNk9QQ_hPWcyRo
